name: 2k18#vibes Waller
text: We ordered pizza and subs at 7:00. Then it came almost 8:30so I called to see how much longer. She goes on to tell me they never received my online order. The manager Angela, was extremely rude. She even hung up on me. I usually go there a lot. I will never go back again!!!

name: Heather Bass
text: Service was top-notch and the restaurant was super clean. The bathrooms were also very clean, which is very important. Also, you get a good amount of food for the value.

name: David Williams
text: The anti pasta salad says it is a ‚Äúfresh Romain mix‚Äù yet mine only had ‚Äúiceberg‚Äù lettuce.  I hate ‚Äúiceberg‚Äù lettuce as it has no nutritional value.  I only eat it on sandwiches and burgers for texture.  I won‚Äôt order salad from here again as it is false advertising.  Pizza is great!

name: Maddison Kate
text: Super-friendly and fast paced customer service. The food is always delicious and truly loved the pizza specials!. Saves a lot of money for people with big families.

name: Robert Thaxton
text: It is a great location people are friendly and the food is delicious.

name: Anastasius Powell
text: Words cannot describe how Hungry Howie's Pizza is so good. I went to pick up my pizzas and they were hot and beautifully made. The service I received was excellent.

name: Tonia Genco
text: This place is poorly run. Today there was no manager to be found and only a snotty blonde teen at the register. No one could find my online order, after 20 minutes of panic. I told them I saw it in the warmer with my name. No apology, just ahhhh. And threw it on the counter! Very unprofessional

name: patti
text: Very hardworking staff and great pizza!! Clean restaurant if going to pick up, and fast delivery if ordering online or over phone.

name: Freida Harmon
text: This is a great location but the worst service staff I have ever encountered. The one young skinny blonde acted like she was doing me a favor to ring me up. Good pizza but I will never go back here. They messed up my order and I got a free side of attitude!

name: Robert Starnes
text: Love there food

name: Tonia Wiley
text: Horrible customer service! Pizza delivered to wrong address and when I called Elli answered and could not even bring herself to apologize or offer a refund! Just argued with me telling me it was delivered to my trailer. Well I live in a ‚Ä¶More

name: PastelPuppy
text: Really good pizzas.

name: Isabella Richard
text: Sarah the blonde worker was the sweetest young lady I have  ever met! Will definitely be coming back to this establishment only for her, give her a raise, she deserves it!!

name: Neil Flavin
text: Ordered a pizza tonight as I do from time to time.  The delivery guy called as he was in an accident on the way.  He was ok.  I called the store and they already knew.  Not only did they already know, but put a plan in action, sent another ‚Ä¶More

name: Dee Beasley
text: This was the 1st time I had Hungry Howie's Pizza in a long time and it was so amazing...The driver was so polite and courteous although it took me a moment to answer the door...Kepp up the good work...So much better than Pizza Hut...Thanks so much...

name: Chris Lytle
text: Seating area inside, good food. More than just pizza

name: David Clark
text: Usually pretty good . Stopped to pick up on way home tonight ...picked up and drove a few miles before i realized they didnt give me my salad..then got home opened our veggie sub that was supposed to be minus black olives---it was loaded ‚Ä¶More

name: tonia Wiley
text: The kids claiming to be the manager just wanted to argue with me instead of figuring out where the delivery driver Monnie? Delivered my $59 order. Who hires people like this?

name: LOUD GAMING _4K
text: Very clean establishment, Fresh pizza üòçüòã . Super friendly staff  ! They went above an beyond as to bringing my pizza out to me while I was waiting in my car during lunch .  Shout out to you man !  Keep up the good work here . Would recommend to anyone if you are nearby .

name: Jerry Deeter
text: bad service good cheap pizza

name: ANGIE M. KNOX
text:
Their pizza is amazingly delicious.
Their subs are soooo delicious. The bread is freshly baked when ordered. In my opinion PIZZA HUT & PAPA JOHNS had really got some serious competition. Fast , friendly delivery drivers..

name: Earl Carballo
text: First impression is great! Good price and great food!

name: Lacie
text: This was my first time ordering from the Hungry Howie's near my house, and I'm very happy. I ordered online and my delivery time was 45 minutes, but my food arrived in like 16 minutes. The food is great and the portion sizes are good for the price!

name: Roberta M
text: Called store to place order but could not make out voice through bad speaker and background noise. So I ordered on line a s picked up in store. Ordered BBQ chicken thin crust. Pizza contained grizzle and fat. Had over 1 1/2 inch around edge ‚Ä¶More

name: Kent Meeler
text: Put extra sauce on it and it is incredible.

name: Traci Kesterson Whiteley
text: Went in to pick up my pizza and had to wait for all the kids to stop messing around and talking to one another to the ones who were off duty. They gave me somebody else's Pizza just because we had the first same name. Got my medium cheese ‚Ä¶More

name: Masey Money
text: Food was fantastic. Order the flavored crust it'll blow your mind. Try something new. Try a meal deal. The prices can't be beat!

name: Rebecca Thomas
text: Very good food. Service was great.

name: The Danosaur
text: Be warned, they gave me a medium pizza even though I ordered a large. How do the employees not catch this? I noticed when I got home and compared the box to one in my recyclables. ‚Ä¶More

name: Son's of Ares Wrestling
text: All it takes is one person with ignorant attitude to turn a customer off. We order from here at least twice a week at a minimum.  I ordered online for pick up and long story short instead of rectifying their system or listening to me ‚Ä¶More

name: Chef Slick
text: The pizza there is pretty great. Way better than pizzahut that‚Äôs for sure. I‚Äôd say what makes it really good is the way the cheese tastes.

name: Amanda Greene
text: Thank you Sarah S at the Belmont , NC location  for making me a delicious crustless pizza!! She was so polite when I asked for such an unsusual request!! Now I can eat pizza again!!

name: Yvonne Torres
text: Pizza is always yummy, hot, and arrives in a timely manner if ordering delivery.

name: Lala Leeper
text: My first encounter with HH wasn't good thought it was due to them being the new kids on the block. So i decided to try them again. Ordered a medium pizza with just cheese and mushroom today. Pizza arrived cold and did not taste good at all. ‚Ä¶More

name: Randall Dowdy
text: Ive never liked deep dish pizza but from howies thats all i order an when it gets here its hot. All the other pizza stores pizza are cold when it gets here::::::::OK here lately ive been trying the subs so far the pizza sub the large is the ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela Wiley
text: Amazing food and great service!  Love the flavored crust!

name: Scott Hughes
text: Plenty of toppings and fast delivery. Good job!

name: Joe
text: Loved it, delicious as always.

name: Paul Webb
text: Best pizza I've ever had

name: Gloria Sutton
text: Great service, great food and fast delivery.

name: Aurora Miller
text: Received a pizza with what smells like spoiled cheese. At first I thought the chicken was spoiled, but the cheese smells and taste like rotten milk. I will never order from this HH again. I also watched my driver sit outside with my pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: First off its the worst pizzaria I've ever been to the pizza is always over cooked or raw the management completely sucks plus a few of the employees told me that one of their drivers named (mark)i believe it was"sits outside snorting ‚Ä¶More

name: April Phillips
text: Love this pizza so affordable.

name: Corey Lester
text: They always seem to forget my sauces when deliverd. Word of advice if you order do, pickup. My food was wrong or missing items two deliveries in a row.

name: Nicole Nottage
text: Most delicious pizza and fresh baked subs

name: Vincent Carmichael
text: It was good

name: Scott Kirkwood
text: Amazing pizza!!!

name: reese Gendreau
text: Was not happy with this location

name: Laura Delplace
text: Very good pizza, for a chain restaurant

name: Ashley Treat
text: I used to work for this company at another location but this location is slacking Its 9:22 and at 8:54 I ordered a junior size pizza And it‚Äôs still not ready ‚Äúpick up order‚Äù ... it‚Äôs very clean though and the manager Nicole and the inside brown headed girl were very pleasant  people good job to them but everyone else no!
